name: Werewolf Was Looking For Love (In Several Wrong Places)
name_original: Werewolf Was Looking For Love (In Several Wrong Places)
description:
Monster dating sim with a twist. In other dating sims you are trying to get the girl/boy/it/monster, but in this one The Game (and it's inhabitant The Wolf) is trying to hook up with YOU (aka The Player).

The game is stable, not aware of any bugs. However, only chapter I is playable with others coming up soon.
